name: Google Local Campaign Immediate Followup
description: An immediate email sent to leads from a local Google Ads campaign, prompting them to complete an assessment.
subject: Thank You for Your Interest in FirstLight Home Care
body:
Thank You for Contacting FirstLight Home Care

Dear {{clientName}},

Thank you for reaching out to us. We understand that finding the right care for yourself or a loved one is a significant decision, and we're here to help every step of the way.

To help us better understand your unique needs, we invite you to complete our online self-assessment. It's a quick and easy way for us to gather the initial information needed to provide you with the best possible care options.

Start Your Self-Assessment

Once you complete the assessment, a member of our team will be in touch shortly to discuss the next steps and schedule an in-home visit at your convenience.

We look forward to speaking with you soon.

Warmly,
The FirstLight Home Care Team

FirstLight Home Care of Rancho Cucamonga | (909) 321-4466
